description: PLAY LIKE A PGA® PRO! Experience the feel of the PGA TOUR® on Palm® PreTM with the most popular golf-game franchise!  JOIN GOLF’S FINEST Play as or alongside Tiger Woods and other great PGA TOUR® pros including Annika Sorenstam, Vijay Singh, Natalie Gulbis, and Retief Goosen.  PLAY ROUNDS ON LEGENDARY COURSES Tee off on over 120 holes across 7 world famous courses like Pebble Beach, TPC Sawgrass, and St. Andrews. See each fairway spring to life with 3D graphics and dynamic camera angles. Hear the roar of the crowd as you make that clutch birdie putt!  GET IN THE SWING WITH FINGERTIP CONTROL  Swipe your finger across the screen to swing your club and get instant visual feedback on your stroke from the Swing Meter. Control the direction and spin of your ball. Drive perfectly, master the short game, and sit atop the leaderboard!     CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GREAT GAMES: TETRIS®, SCRABBLE, The Sims™ 3, ROCK BAND, Sudoku, MONOPOLY, Need for Speed™ Undercover, Battleship, and EA SPORTSTM FIFA World Cup South AfricaTM
